title: Homo Jihad
description: The central character,David Underwood, a young school teacher, hopeless romantic and regular on the drug-fuelled gay scene in London meets Yossi, an Israeli Jew, at a nightclub and a long-distance relationship develops. But how will David react when he discovers the truth behind Yossi's tragic past? And what will happen when David's ex, Ahmed, who is under intense family pressure to marry, makes a sudden reappearance? The terrorist atrocity of 7/7 marks a turning point for the lovers.
author: Timothy Graves
